subject: Guest post: What nearly 10 years of copy trading on eToro actually looks like
body:
Hi BabyPips team,

I'm Tom, and I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 — nearly 10 years. I've documented the entire journey across 335 YouTube videos on my channel Social Trading Vlog, and recently launched socialtradingvlog.com with detailed guides.

I'd love to contribute a guest post:

"From Forex to Social Trading: Lessons from Nearly 10 Years of Real Copy Trading"

Key points I'd cover:

- How to evaluate traders to copy (the metrics that actually matter vs vanity stats)
- Common mistakes I made in my early years and how I fixed them
- Why 76% of eToro traders lose money — and what the other 24% do differently
- Realistic expectations: what copy trading can and can't do

I have real performance data, screenshots, and specific examples. This isn't a theoretical piece — it's from someone who's been doing it with real money since 2016.

Would you be interested? Happy to send an outline or full draft.

Cheers,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
